data.name: properties of regular polygons
data.description:
The task:
---
write the function `polygonal_properties` that returns
```
[sum of interior angles,
interior angle : to the margin of 1e-9,
exterior angle : to the margin of 1e-9]
```

in degrees for regular polygons

Examples:

``` python
polygonal_properties(3) => [3, 180, 60.0, 120.0]
polygonal_properties(4) => [4, 360, 90.0, 90.0]
polygonal_properties(5) => [5, 540, 108.0, 72.0]
polygonal_properties(6) => [6, 720, 120.0, 60.0]
polygonal_properties(7) => [7, 900, 128.57142857142856, 51.42857142857143]
polygonal_properties(8) => [8, 1080, 135.0, 45.0]
polygonal_properties(9) => [9, 1260, 140.0, 40.0]
polygonal_properties(10) => [10, 1440, 144.0, 36.0]
polygonal_properties(11) => [11, 1620, 147.27272727272728, 32.72727272727273]
polygonal_properties(12) => [12, 1800, 150.0, 30.0]
```
